name: Financial Modeling Prep
label: Financial Modeling Prep

per_day.notes: Free tier: 250 API calls per calendar day:contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}.

per_month.notes: No fixed monthly cap; daily limit is the primary quota.

per_minute.notes: No documented per-minute limit for free plan; use daily limit as guide.

per_second.notes: No documented per-second limit; assume general server-side protection.

reset_window.notes: Usage resets at midnight UTC each day.

credits_model.notes: Each API request costs 1 credit under FMP’s free plan (no weighted endpoints).

notes: Free-tier multi-asset provider. FMP is the primary source for most FX, crypto, commodities, equities, and market-hours data.
